title: Zelenskyy at the UN accuses Russian military of war crimes
content:
1. Zelenskyy at the UN accuses Russian military of war crimes  The Associated Press
  2. WATCH: Zelensky addresses UN Security Council  Washington Post
  3. Zelensky: Russia 'will try to hide the traces of their crimes'  Yahoo News
  4. Zelenskyy To Address U.N. After Accusing Russia Of War Crimes In Ukraine  NBC News
  5. Zelenskyy warns UN of more discoveries of alleged Russian atrocities in Ukraine  Fox News
